Title: The Road to Hamelin
Writer: Veena Sud (developer), Dawn Prestwich, Nicole Yorkin
Actors: Mireille Enos, Joel Kinnaman, Elias Koteas, Hugh Dillon
Plot: Holder and Linden now believe that a police officer framed Joe Mills for the murders of the young women found in the swamp. When they learn that an officer known to both of them lived next ...
